remarks: A constructed one-slot structure in a weak universe containing the index of the base set extractor.  (Contributed by AV, 27-Mar-2020.)
statement:
1str.g $e |- G = { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , B >. } $.
1strwun.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. WUni ) $.
1strwunbndx.b $e |- ( ph -> ( Base ` ndx ) e. U ) $.
1strwunbndx $p |- ( ( ph /\ B e. U ) -> G e. U ) $.
